other_tests.findings: Biopsy revealed mixed lymphocytes, CD19/20 +, CD5 -, CD10 weakly positive, BCL-2/BCL-6 positive.
PET scan demonstrated uptake in the abdomen and rectal area.
other_tests.changes_over_time: PET scan in ___ demonstrated recurrent disease (L retrocrural area 2.5 cm c SCV 8.8 c/w lymphomatous recurrence). Follow-up scan showed a new lymph node in periaortic area that was PET-avid. PET on ___ showed increased avidity in celiac node concerning for progression of disease.

other_tests.findings: Liver biopsy showed mild steatosis without balloon degeneration / intracellular hyalin, and mild portal/lobular mononuclear cell inflammation.
One episode of paroxysmal atrial fibrillation was noted in the setting of caffeine intake + adderall use.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Developed again in setting of Gemzar, s/p 2 weeks of anticoagulation.

other_tests.findings: Feces negative for C. difficile toxin A & B by EIA (Reference Range-Negative).
